text: Matthew Allard de Vere Drummond (born Matthew Allard Robert Vaughn; 7 March 1971), known professionally as Matthew Vaughn, is an English movie director, producer and screenwriter. He produced movies including Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels (1998) and Snatch (2000), and directed Layer Cake (2004), Stardust (2007), Kick-Ass (2010), X-Men: First Class (2011), Kingsman: The Secret Service (2014), Kingsman: The Golden Circle (2017), The King's Man (2021) and Argylle (2024). In 2002, Vaughn married German supermodel Claudia Schiffer in Suffolk."". Vogue. Retrieved 6 March 2012.
